resources.string: Place options: \nDial call, Save favorite, Get direction
Touch in info window \nto find place detail
Choose start point and destination \nto get direction
Swipe left or right to delete an item
Search all places that around your location base on their category, such as restaurant, coffeeâ€¦
Just type a keyword that include the place detail you want to search and check the results. You can make the voice search also.
Check the list places result on map screen, display more result if you want, show places result in list view, make the filter if you are searching in category mode.
Display all detail information about the place, you can make a call, visit website, send email and find the direction to the place.
Show on map the direction information, you can change the destination and direction mode, specially you can active the navigation control.
Get the phone sensor and make a navigation directly with map screen.
Show your favorite places on list view, you can delete by swipe left or right on item.
Show your search history places on list view, you can delete by swipe left or right on item.
